content: When I look PHR profiles in simplifier.net I can see that a lot of data elements are strikethrough. For example in Medication Statement Profile the data element basedOn is strikethrough (there is a line drawn over the basedOn). Does this mean that basedOn element is not supported with Medication Statement Profile and thus can't be used in profiles stored in Finnish PRH?
Hi, I managed to resolve this question by myself :). It's written in instructions. Yes, strikethrough means that a data element is not supported in PHR profile.
